item.description:
Essence Meditation

Join John and Lisl from The Essence of Being for a wonderful guided meditation/journey aided by pure plant and tree essences that help you open energetic channels, access profound Inner Wisdom and integrate that knowledge in order to create a more fulfilling life. Reclaiming your relationship with Nature through the Wisdom of the Plants and Trees is the most direct route back to yourself and the manifestation of your Personal Destiny.

Sunday, November 29th
1:00-3:00 pm
$15.00

The Essence of Being at Johnnycake Mountain
184 Johnnycake Mountain Road, Burlington, CT 06013
860-673-6863 ~ www.theessenceofbeingat.com ~ essenceofbeing@hotmail.com
item.name: Essence Meditation
